title: prathivaaram vaaram
sahitya:
prativAram vAram mAnasa bhajarE raghuvIram
caraNam 1

kAlAmbOdhara kAnta sharIram kaushika shuka shaunaka parivAram
   
caraNam 2

kausalyA dasharatha shukumAram kalikalmaSa bhaya grahana kuThAram
   
caraNam 3

paramahamsa hrt-padma vihAram pratihata dashamukhabala vistAram
